text: Egha an orazima, Arkelaus uan afeziam Herotɨn danganim inigha Judian Atrivimɨn iti. Ezɨ Josep Judian Distrighɨn mangan atiatingi. Egha God da irebamɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam inigha egha Galilin Distrighɨn ghu.(2:22) Herot ovengezɨma Romɨn gavman a garir kantri abɨgha an otaribagh anɨngi. Ezɨ Arkelaus atrivimɨn ikia Distrigh Galili ko Distrigh Judian gari. A 10 plan azenibar atrivimɨn ike.
